original_text: While it remained unsold, did it not remain your own? And after it was sold, was it not at your disposal? Why is it that you have contrived this deed in your heart? You have not lied to man but to God.”
korean_text: 땅이 그대로 있을 때에는 네 땅이 아니며 판 후에도 네 마음대로 할 수가 없더냐 어찌하여 이 일을 네 마음에 두었느냐 사람에게 거짓말한 것이 아니요 하나님께로다

sentences.original_text: did it not remain your own?
was it not at your disposal?
sentences.korean_translation: 그것이 너희 마음대로 할 수 없었더냐?

sentences.original_text: Why is it that you have contrived this deed in your heart?
sentences.korean_translation: 어찌하여 이 일을 너희 마음에 꾀했느냐?

sentences.original_text: You have not lied to man
